string-array.name: updates
string-array.item: v1.1.2: Fix some bugs, add 30/30 billing mode, add EVE device for traffic counter, allow to bill (excluded) numbers in plan #1 or #2
v1.1.1: Fix happy-new-year-bug (run call meter twice to fix stats)
v1.1: Add data statistics, allow wildcards for excluded numbers: e.g. *555/666* excludes 4555/6667
v1.0.1: Add translations: dutch+potuguese, add 30/6 billing mode
v1.0: Allow a second plan for calls/sms (please check prefs!), allow to bill messages as calls, new about, remove ads for translator, add 30/10 billing mode, remove outdated translations: dutch+czech
v0.9.6: Allow to exclude some numbers from billing, add spanish translation, remove ads for translators
v0.9.5: Change ProgressIndicator, prepare to remove ads for donators, fix long text messages
v0.9.3: Add Changelog, more text in about
